attributes.review: 0/10 recommend. I, Karen, downloaded this app to support our amazing president, but then I started getting horribly vulgar recommendations like “Harass the manager” and “Go yell at Susan some more” on my Facebook page! I was at first in shock, but then I thought that maybe the app had been hacked, so I deleted the app and it all went away. Then when I redownloaded the app, it all came back. Never using again! Horrible experience!
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: this app literally broke down my fridge this app now stops me from being able to download pou and after a week of waiting and supporting 👻orange👻 a bar would appear on top of my head 😔 i was just not able to look at this wonderful disgusting app bc my mom said to get off of it and just no i’m so unhappy with my results i can’t take this anymore i just wanted to see the flying gorillas and i’m so disappointed like literally worst app ever made every night my phones goes off and starts play “i love it when u call me señorita “ by this orange looking guy and i’m so mad i couldn’t see the gorillas bc that’s what i downloaded this app for but i guess not so now i’m gonna go play makeup games 😔💔
attributes.title: horrible app

attributes.review: So imma avid supporter of trump. I love him cuz he’s my orange sugar daddy, but anyways, like the app was just like acting weird. I tried to open it and it was just wonky but like fix the app and I’ll love my daddy even more because like he stopped answering my calls and texts and I just need to talk to him about our orange baby. Cuz like who’s gonna support this child cuz like it can’t be me but with my orange sugar daddies help I can. But like I need my child support trump baby
attributes.title: Trump 2020

attributes.review: I was really excited to get this app as a source of information to stay updated during this crazy time. Sadly, the app does nothing but crash and is completely full of falsehood. I am shocked that such an app is even allowed to be on the App Store. I expected more, and was underwhelmed. Sad! Such fake news! I sure hope that something is done about this so that nobody else has to put up with this dumb thing.
attributes.title: SAD!

attributes.review: You’re taking away TickTock it is an app where people dance and it’s mostly kids that want to have fun taking away fun from the kids that like dancing and lip-synching it is terrible that you are doing this to little kids musical.l. Started it off but tick-tock had to end it’s terrible how you take it away this way I heard that it’s going to be deleted from everybody’s phone on Friday but will get you harder than anybody has
attributes.title: Trump must go

attributes.review: ok i’m a proud republican and a true supporter of Donald J. Trump. But this app is poorly made and my phone just kept glitching out and it’s not easy to use. These kids on here rating it one star because they dislike OUR president is incredibly telling of what the next generation is like. but this app really is no good. Sorry Donald you’re getting attacked like this but fix your app! Also i’m completely and totally kidding  this is for tiktok ✨
attributes.title: disappointed

attributes.review: This app is terrible. What can of president are you making the app for people to see. I decided to download this it because I thought it was interesting, but there is nothing worth seeing in this app. For anyone who wants to download it, do not do it. I was crying just by the terrible content on this app.😭 I’m just gonna act like I didn’t see, hear, and I’m not gonna speak of this app ever again. It needs to be removed.
attributes.title: Worst App🙈🙉🙊

attributes.title: YeeHaw

attributes.review: This app kept making my phone crash and I would try to do things on it and it would just completely crash and make my phone have to re start. Besides that it took two and a half hours to even download so after all of that I just wouldn’t use this app if I where you. It doesn’t work very well and when it does it is veryyyy slow so yeah I just wouldn’t recommend
attributes.title: It suckes

attributes.review: i opened the app and all i saw was an absurdly treacherous, wrinkly, orange, looking cheeto with hair. my daughter was sitting right next to me and when she saw what was on my screen, SHE HAD A HEART ATTACK!!!!! she is now dead because of this and i can’t believe that there wouldn’t even be a warning as to what there would be when i opened the app. i am utterly dissatisfied and i now weep over my daughters grave every night.
attributes.title: i can’t believe anyone would download this
